channel.title: SLOMISCAPE USERS, READ, SO YOU ARN'T DAZED, CONFUSED AND ANGRY! (Also has a ?)
channel.description:
About 1 1/2 hours ago, my computer monitor almost literally caught fire. It started smoking, like really smoking. Big bellowing puffs of smoke. The picture started turning into random shapes and sizes, than it went blank. I now have no monitor, so my server will be down until I can get a new monitor. Thx.
I posted this like 2 mins ago, just thought I'd quote myself lol, anyways: Has anyone ever heard of this problem before? I need help considering a new good monitor is like $270. Thx
